title: 1 MONTH FREE City Congress Park 5 Min Wash Park Speer Downtown
neighborhood: City Park Congress Park North Cherry Creek
posting_body: Welcome to Downtown Denvers BEST DEAL,
The Advertised Rent includes the 4 weeks FREE RENT in over a 12 month lease.

New luxury community right by City & Congress park
Amazing city and mountain views on rooftop lounge and outdoor deck
Heated pool and large hot tub surrounded by grills and cabanas with WiFi
Large and fully equipped fitness center and cycle studio
Lots of shops and restaurants right outside your door and a short walk away
Free bike storage with easy street access
Dog park right outside main entrance
Call or TEXT ASAP for Personal Showings!
